wikipedia_page.main: Roland Edge (born 25 November 1978) is an English footballer who is the assistant manager at non-league Folkestone Invicta.

link_mentions.page: 2000 Football League Second Division play-off Final
response: Six minutes into the second half, Gillingham had an opportunity to double their lead when Hessenthaler crossed the ball from a position on the right of the pitch and Onoura outjumped a Wigan defender, but his header went slightly to the left of the goal.Classic Match : Wigan Athletic 2–3 Gillingham (AET) 2000 Division 2 Play-off Final, 01:41:16–01:41:43   Less than two minutes later, Wigan equalised; de Zeeuw crossed the ball from a wide position and Haworth flicked it up with his left foot and then hit a shot with his right from  out past Bartram and into the net, to score what Phil Shaw of The Independent described as "one of Wembley's great goals".Classic Match : Wigan Athletic 2–3 Gillingham (AET) 2000 Division 2 Play-off Final, 01:42:07–01:43:20  With the score level once again, the urgency of the game increased.  The first substitution of the game occurred at the one-hour mark, as Gillingham brought on Paul Smith in place of defender Roland Edge.  Moments later, Gillingham were awarded a free kick when Wigan's McGibbon fouled Asaba.  Gillingham's Ashby met Gooden's kick with a header in the penalty area but it went wide of the goal, with the Sky commentary team stating that he "should have done better".Classic Match : Wigan Athletic 2–3 Gillingham (AET) 2000 Division 2 Play-off Final, 01:51:10–01:52:30
